name: busybox
description: 一个多调用二进制文件，将许多常用Unix工具合并为单个可执行文件

options.description: List the currently defined functions in BusyBox
List the currently defined functions in BusyBox with full details
Show information about the specified SCRIPT
Install BusyBox symlinks for defined functions
Install BusyBox symlinks as symbolic links to the specified directory (DIR), default directory if not specified

name: arp
description: 用于查看和修改主机的ARP缓存表，该表包含IP地址与MAC地址的映射关系。
